head.title: Extract hyperlinks from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdShortName}} to detect and extract hyperlinks from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} without additional tools or software.

header.title: Extract hyperlinks from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Easily detect and extract URLs and hyperlinks from PDF, Word, Excel, and other document types using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document parsing API for {{EnvName}} developers. It supports extracting hyperlinks, text, images, and structured content from various file formats such as PDF, Word, Excel, HTML, and more—without relying on external software.

formats.title: Supported formats for hyperlink extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} can extract hyperlinks from a wide variety of document types. See below for commonly supported formats.

examples.comment_1: Load the document containing hyperlinks using the {{textParser}} class
examples.comment_2: Verify that the file supports hyperlink extraction
examples.comment_3: Hyperlink extraction is not available for the file
examples.comment_4: Retrieve and process the extracted hyperlinks

steps.title: Steps to extract hyperlinks from {{FileFormatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables {{EnvName}} developers to extract hyperlinks from {{FileFormatUp}} files by following these simple steps:
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} file using a {{textParser}} instance.
content.step_2: Check if the document supports hyperlink extraction.
content.step_3: Retrieve the list of hyperlinks from the document.
content.step_4: Loop through the results and work with the extracted URLs.

more_features.title: Advanced document parsing capabilities
more_features.description: In addition to hyperlink extraction, {{ProdShortName}} allows you to extract text, metadata, images, and structured data—supporting powerful data processing workflows.

feature_1.title: Hyperlink detection from documents
feature_1.content: Quickly extract URLs and link annotations from documents like PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, and more.

feature_2.title: Support for web and embedded links
feature_2.content: Detect and extract both standard web URLs and embedded document links across multiple formats.

feature_3.title: Flexible parsing options
feature_3.content: Customize extraction settings for scanning specific sections or pages to improve performance and accuracy.

code_1.title: How to extract hyperlinks from a PDF using link options
code_1.content: This code example shows how to extract all hyperlinks from a PDF file using custom options.

code_1.comment_2: Check if hyperlink extraction is supported
code_1.comment_3: Set link extraction options to narrow results
code_1.comment_4: Extract hyperlink data from the document
code_1.comment_5: Handle the list of extracted links
